about_the_game:
In The Exorcist: Gravebound Horror, you take on the role of an experienced exorcist called to a forsaken village plagued by mysterious disappearances. Entire families vanish overnight, leaving behind only whispers of terror. The villagers suspect the church is the source of the darkness, but their fearful glances and half-truths hint at something far more sinister.

As you investigate, you realize this haunting is unlike anything you've encountered before. This survival horror game immerses you in a chilling paranormal mystery where fear lurks around every corner. With atmospheric terror, supernatural entities, psychological horror elements, and intense exorcism mechanics, The Exorcist: Gravebound Horror delivers a truly terrifying experience for horror game fans.
